title: Mutta Kalakki Lyrics From Youth | Ken Karunaas | GV Prakash Kumar

sections.intro: Get ready to groove to Mutta Kalakki, the high-energy youth anthem from the movie Youth. Composed by the hit-maker GV Prakash Kumar and performed with infectious energy by Ken Karunaas, this track is a perfect blend of local 'gaana' vibes and modern beats. Featuring Suraj Venjaramoodu, the music video is a visual treat for fans of quirky, mass entertainers.
sections.easterEgg:
Hidden Details You Missed! ЁЯХ╡я╕ПтАНтЩВя╕П

  • The term 'Mutta Kalakki' refers to a popular street-food egg dish in Tamil Nadu, used here as a metaphor for the protagonist's heart being 'scrambled' by love.
  • Ken Karunaas, the lead, is the son of famous actor/singer Karunaas. His vocal style and body language in this song pay a direct tribute to his father's iconic 'Gaana' hits from the 2000s.
  • GV Prakash Kumar used a 'Thappaattam' rhythm section layered with electronic bass to ensure the song works for both local festivals and modern club settings.
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

Who is the singer of Mutta Kalakki?

The song is performed by Ken Karunaas, with music composed by GV Prakash Kumar.

What is the movie Youth (2025) about?

The movie 'Youth' is a coming-of-age drama starring Ken Karunaas and Suraj Venjaramoodu, focusing on the struggles and aspirations of the modern generation.

stanzas:
Ae manja baloon-u nee super saloon-u
Hey vaadi cooling watermelan-u
En beauty buffoon-u ae body colon-u
Ae unnaala en life sukkun-u

Night-aanaa kanavula vaarudhu yen
Bright-aanaa yosikkiraen unna pathiyae
Mandaiyila padipponnum aeralaidi
Azhaula unna minja aal illaiyaedi

Minikki needhaan en nenja kulukki
Sirukki vaadi yen mutta kalakki
Azhagi, pogaadha romba vilai
Silungi poraalae enna muzhungi

Manasu full-aa un maela dhaan
Thirundhi ponaen unnaala dhaan
Thiriyuraen un pinnaala dhaan
Okay sollu kannaala dhaan

Pudhusa porandha feeling-maa
Sirichaa heart healing-maa
Kanaka love calling-maa
Enna left-hand la dealing pannaadhammaa

englishStanzas:
Ae manja baloon-u nee super saloon-u Hey vaadi cooling watermelan-u

[Hey yellow balloon, you're a super salon; come here, my cool watermelon!]


En beauty buffoon-u ae body colon-u Ae unnaala en life sukkun-u

[My beauty buffoon, my body cologne; my life has become shattered because of you.]


Night-aanaa kanavula vaarudhu yen Bright-aanaa yosikkiraen unna pathiyae

[Why do you come in my dreams at night? I think about you brightly all the time.]


Mandaiyila padipponnum aeralaidi Azhaula unna minja aal illaiyaedi

[Studies won't go into my head; there is no one to beat you in beauty, girl.]


Minikki needhaan en nenja kulukki Sirukki vaadi yen mutta kalakki

[You are the shiny one who shook my heart; come here, girl, you've stirred my heart like an egg (Mutta Kalakki).]


Manasu full-aa un maela dhaan Thirundhi ponaen unnaala dhaan

[My whole heart is on you; I've changed for the better because of you.]


Pudhusa porandha feeling-maa Sirichaa heart healing-maa Enna left-hand la dealing pannaadhammaa

[It's a feeling of being reborn; your smile heals my heart; don't dismiss me so easily (left-hand dealing).]
